-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron receives Perceptor's comm message, "Tell me back at base 
Perceptor, I have more pressing things." His winged form glides 
along, then cuts downward as he reaches the Decepticon base.

He lands easily in front of the base entrance, and enters as the 
doors slide in. Warhead was being dragged behind him. First thing he 
does is ditch Warhead's limp body in one of the CR chambers, then he 
heads to the control room and begins waiting for the rest of what 
Predacons he has left to return. He opens a basewide 
comm, "Switchblade, have you finished moving all of the autoguns?" 

Switchblade replies having just finished draging the weapons to the 
storage room, "Ya ya, i'm done here, send some troops down here any 
time."  Switchblade starts heading back to the engine room.

"Goooood," purrs Megatron as he starts thinking of defense locations 
for the auto guns as he goes over a 3d data mapped view of the 
terrain around the Predacon base.
